entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error on dotnet workload install or update #26518
  • [testing] Resizetizer unit tests failing on ARM #26516
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Targeting ONLY Windows requires the maui-tizen workload #26511
  • TabbedView layout jumps after loading collection view #26510
  • Android crashes with PublishTrimmed and TrimMode full #26509
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [CollectionView] EmptyView with button doesn't t work on iOS #26508
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Reenable DropEventCoordinates UI test #26507
    Backlog
  • [Android] No Visual Difference When Using PlatformConfiguration.AndroidSpecific SetUseDefaultPadding and SetUseDefaultShadow in Button #26505
    Backlog
  • WindowManagerFlags.Secure does not block screenshots on modal pages in Android Net 9 #26502
  • Maui net8 & net9 - Tab pages do not activate OnAppearing [Mac] #26499
    Backlog
  • Issue on Windows - Exception thrown: 'System.NullReferenceException' in Microsoft.Maui.Controls.dll #26498
    Backlog
  • ListView headers gets invisible when collapsing/expanding sections on IOS, Mac and Android #26494
    Backlog
  • [Windows] ListView Items Text Not Rendered inside the TabbedPage #26488
    Backlog
  • System image download error. #26487
  • Windows packaging fails when MAUI project name has an underscore in it #26486
    Backlog

Closed

  • [iOS & Mac] Gradient background size is incorrect when invalidating parent #26057
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Can't use LinearGradientBrush as Button Background on iOS #20218
    Backlog
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] Background layer frame mapping has poor performance #24847
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Shell.FlyoutItemIsVisible on FlyoutItem in Shell binding does not update #26434
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Intermittent System.IO Errors During Build, Rebuild, and Clean Operations #26517
  • Windows local notification using Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.Notifications #24788
    Backlog
  • MAUI building MAC catalyst Arm64 dll is not getting loaded and throws System.BadImageException #26500
  • Flyout menu (Hamburger menu) appears "out of nowhere" when BackbuttonBehaviour is defined (Android only) #26470
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Issue with TouchBehavior Background Color Remaining After Navigation in .NET MAUI (iOS 18) #25280
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] GroupedItemTemplateCollection CollectionChanged event not unsubscribed, causes memory leak. #22954
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] ListView ScrollTo Method Throws NullReferenceException #26345
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Editor Scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25581
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Exception when adding Pin to Map control. #26459

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix Shell animation and button visual states on Shell nav #26521
  • Fix more things with fonts (embedded) and unpackaged apps #26515
  • [iOS] Use a GeneralWrapperView for the EmptyView on CollectionView #26513
    area-controls-collectionview, potential-regression, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 42 #26512
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for Softkeyboard Return key of an Entry control shows Done when the property ReturnType is set to Next #26501
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 41 #26492
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 40 #26491
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 39 #26490
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, p/1, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 36 #26436
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Disable flaky DropEventCoordinates test #26506
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • Move DataTemplateSelector to own file in template #26489
    area-templates
  • Add Gerald & Javier as UI Test CODEOWNERS #26497
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Add TJ as Localization chief in CODEOWNERS #26496
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Remove Tizen people from CODEOWNERS #26495
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 38 #26469
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix for ListView ScrollTo Method throws NullReferenceException #26385
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #26474
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Sample Content template: changed currentTheme value with RequestedTheme property. #26424
    area-templates, community ✨
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10679157 #26479
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR3
  • Correct Button EventHandler signature in template #26473
    area-templates

Updated

  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` (take 2) #26460
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨, t/perf
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-infrastructure
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] ScrollView - Setting SetClipChildren to false #26475
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Android] Click on flyout clicks on page behind - fix #26461
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • Fixed [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25919
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241209202058740 to main #26483
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Fix for TableView cells become empty after adding a new cell with context actions #26326
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Improve TextToSpeech function by adding a speech rate parameter #24798
    area-essentials, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    platform/macOS 🍏, p/1, community ✨, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Added tests to validate the ItemsUpdatingScrollMode property in CarouselView #26160
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix Incorrect First and Last Visible Item index in CollectionView Scrolled Event #26468
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for Flyout closing when updating the FlyoutPage.Detail #26425
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
